text: Valentina Rodini (born 28 January 1995) is an Italian rower who won two medals at senior level at the Summer Universiade (bronze) and Mediterranean Games (gold). ==Biography== She competed in the women's lightweight double sculls event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1995 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Competitors at the 2018 Mediterranean Games Category:Mediterranean Games gold medalists for Italy Category:Mediterranean Games medalists in rowing Category:Rowers of Fiamme Gialle Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Italy Category:Medalists at the 2015 Summer Universiade
title: Valentina Rodini
